channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: The Unofficial Observer
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Lieutentant Arthur J. Burks)
item.description: This is in the popular Burks manner. High-pressure thrills. Smashing action. Red-blooded excitement. Breathless suspense. And then the devastating climax.
